name: playwright-test-framework
description: Extensible Playwright test framework with API and UI wrappers

scripts.test:headed: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=false playwright test --headed
scripts.test:api: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/api
scripts.test:api:headless: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=true playwright test src/tests/api
scripts.test:ui:old: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/ui --ignore-pattern='**/sitecore/*.test.ts'
scripts.test:ui:old:headless: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=true playwright test src/tests/ui --ignore-pattern='**/sitecore/*.test.ts'
scripts.test:integration: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/integration
scripts.test:integration:headless: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=true playwright test src/tests/integration
scripts.test:headless: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=true playwright test
scripts.test:all-old: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests --ignore-pattern='**/sitecore/*.test.ts'
scripts.test:sitecore: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/sitecore
scripts.test:sitecore:headless: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js HEADLESS=true playwright test src/tests/sitecore
scripts.test:sitecore:smoke: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/sitecore --grep '@smoke'
scripts.test:sitecore:regression: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/sitecore --grep '@regression'
scripts.test:sitecore:login: npm run setup:check && playwright test src/tests/sitecore/sitecore-login.test.ts
scripts.test:retry: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=3 playwright test src/tests/integration/retry-example.test.ts
scripts.test:retry-ui: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=3 playwright test src/tests/ui/login-with-retry.ui.test.ts
scripts.test:no-retry: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=0 playwright test
scripts.test:max-retry: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js RETRY_COUNT=5 playwright test
scripts.test:windows: npm run setup:check && node scripts/run-with-env.js playwright test
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:test-app && npm run setup:playwright
